animeTitle: Ikemen Sengoku: Toki wo Kakeru ga Koi wa Hajimaranai
otherNames: イケメン戦国◆時をかけるが恋ははじまらない
synopsis: My name is Sasuke. I was a graduate student, but one day I got time-slipped into a warring period. On top of that, it's a different warring period that I learned about in history textbooks....
